thread.title: Why China, Russia care if you cheated
thread.title_full: Why China, Russia care if you cheated

title: Why China, Russia care if you cheated
text: September 02, 2015 at 11:28 AM EDT Why China, Russia care if you cheated When Americans cheat on their spouses, China and Russia may want to know. The countries' intelligence services are gathering data from recent cyberattacks to possibly target government workers for information, CNN reported Wednesday, citing a U.S. official. China and Russia are using a database of information obtained in breaches ranging from the U.S. Office of Personnel Management to cheating ...
